Soul_Drain.help: Using this power, you can drain the essence of all nearby foes' souls, thus increasing your own strength. Each affected foe will lose some Hit Points and add to your Damage and Accuracy. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Long

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage [SCOURGE].

Dark_Embrace.help: You tap into the energy of the Netherworld to protect yourself from damage. This Dark Embrace shrouds you and grants resistance to Lethal, Smashing, Negative Energy and Toxic damage. Recharge: Fast
Dark_Embrace.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} protects you from lethal, smashing, toxic and negative energy.

Power_Boost.help: Greatly boosts the secondary effects of your powers. Your powers effects like Disorients, Holds, Immobilizes, Heals, Defense Buffs, Endurance Drains, Knockbacks and more, are all improved. The effects of Power Boost last a short while, and only the next couple of attacks will be boosted. You must be level 41 and have Soul Drain or Dark Embrace before selecting this power. Recharge: Long

messages.attackerHit: You tap into your inner power and boost the abilities of your next few attacks.

Soul_Storm.help: Like Ghost Widow, you can summon the souls of your victims to do your bidding. Soul Storm enraptures a single target Holding them while their life-force is drained from their body. You must be level 41 and have Soul Drain or Dark Embrace before selecting this power. Recharge: Slow
Soul_Storm.targetHelp: You are being Held by a Soul Storm. You are taking negative Damage over time as your life is drained.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.

Summon_Mistress.help: Ghost Widow has assigned a Fortunata Mistress for you to command. Arguably, the most powerful of the Fortunatas, these rare few have mastered numerous psychic abilities and risen to the top of Lord Recluse's beautiful Black Widows. Your access to this Fortunata is very limited. You can only summon her once every 15 minutes and she will leave after 4 minutes, or if you exit a zone or mission. You must be level 44 and have two other Soul Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Recharge: Extremely Long
Summon_Mistress.shortHelp: Summon Fortunata Mistress: Ranged Moderate DMG(Psionic)
